page.title: 02Daily life in Barkestone
page.content: Every morning I get up at 8 oclock wash my face eat my breakfast of corn flakes. Then I play my cornet get my shoes on and go to school at 9 o clock. When I get home from school at 1/4 past 3 I empty my sandwich bag get dressed in my old clothes and play outside then watch television.Then me and my brother Edward go out on our bikes around the village have dinner get ready for bed watch television and go to bed.The same thing happens on Tuesday.We go to tennis because it is junior night.On wednesday all the juniors go to music at Hose and play tennis at Hose we get home from tennis at 4 oclock then get into our old clothes and play outside. On Thursday I go to cubs at half past 6 and my brother goes to scouts at 8 oclock.Scouts end at 9 o'clock.
